title: Who thinks that Riot should come up with a new map that takes place in the Void?
body: I've been thinking that there are maps for just about everywhere but the Void.  And they should come out with a map for it.  Anyone who thinks this is a good idea, say so in the comments, and be completely honest.

replies.body: I completely agree. There is a poll option also if you really want to know how many people agree or not.

I love the idea of new maps and game types, but sadly the community as a whole has shown that it isnt worth riot's time to make them.

Nobody plays dominion, TT still isnt that popular even though they give nerfs and buffs specifically for it, and both of them are arguably as well done as SR.

If anything they should make thematic skins for SR, that way they will actually be used.

>Nobody plays dominion, TT still isnt that popular even though they give nerfs and buffs specifically for it, 

Both Dominion and TT get some map-specific champion adjustments. The problem is that any adjustments only occur about twice a year at best. To put this into perspective, aside from updates carrying over from SR, the last time TT/Dom got changes before the TT mini-rework in 5.11 was  item/jungle changes in 4.21 back in December 2014. The last champion changes at all were in August 2014 with 4.15. The community at large doesn't really support alternate maps because Riot doesn't really support alternate maps.
THEY SHOULD DO IT BECAUSE I LOVE TO PLAY {{champion:31}} SO 1
I love to play as {{champion:31}} too.  I would also want to see it because I main {{champion:161}}

The void is a heavily unexplored land of possibilities. I want to see what they think it can be.

That is the truth, rito pls.
Why would I ever want to give Riot less work? I want everything! NOW!
That would be cool! What kind of game mode would it be? Free for all? Survival mode? (IE coop vs. ai with lots of different waves of void monsters not just enemy champions and minions)

I don't want to see it for lore reasons.  The Void has been a place so foreign that it warps the minds or bodies of all who interact with it (see Malz or Kass) and is full of beings whose power is unfathomable to the minds of mortal men.  Not even the Shadow Isles can compare, they just have a problem with telling death and life apart there.

Why not have a map from somewhere else that hasn't had one yet, like Mount Targon or the Kumungu Jungle?

Amazing idea. As long as there can be a shrine to Teemo in the middle, because Teemo is our lord and savior.

Like, I won't lie, they've done a helluva good job on all of the thematic concepts they've done so far, but people barely touch maps other than SR and ARAM. Dominion's playerbase has slowly been dwindling, and TT is filled with nothing but bots.
